item.title: Personal Finance
item.description: One fine day a throught came by that its been 6 Years since I started working, and I have not given enough attention on my financial situation. no financial investments or goals. Initially I thougt I can live off a excel sheet where I can set up my earnings, expenses and goals and then see how I’m doing. but things got complicated, when I wanted to increase earning yearly, and based on that I wanted to project the contributions to a goal.
